lines.dialogue: Captain, the subspace readings are off the charts. Never seen anything like it.
It appears to be a localized distortion... almost like a tear in spacetime.
Maintain safe distance. Scan for energy signatures. I don't like surprises.
Master Elias, the transmutation circle... it's glowing!
Impossible! The final component is missing. Unless...
(Banging on door) Open up in the name of the Council! We know what you're hiding!
Just tell me what you saw, Sarah. From the beginning.
It was raining so hard... but I saw the car. And the man... he had a limp.
A limp? That matches the profile from the Becker case.
The markings on this temple... ancient, pre-Incan perhaps.
Incredible. This could rewrite history! We must document everything.
(Appearing suddenly) Not so fast, Thorne. This discovery belongs to me!
Tom, did you reprogram the ToasterBot again? It's demanding 'total kitchen dominance'.
I just updated its firmware! How was I supposed to know it included sentience?
Your reign of unevenly browned bread ends now, humans!
Captain, the map fragment we lifted from the governor's ship... it matches!
Blackheart's legendary treasure... Are you sure it's not a trap?
Trap or not, Zara, that treasure will be ours! Set course for Serpent's Tooth island!
Clara, did you hear that? A whisper... from the empty balcony.
It's an old theater, Ben. Drafts and creaks. Focus on your lines.
Ain't no draft. That's the 'Gray Lady'. She watches every rehearsal.
Professor, your temporal displacement unit created a paradox loop in 1888!
Impossible! My calculations were precise! Unless... Subject Zero interfered?
(Smiling enigmatically) Some timelines just want to unravel, Professor.
Johnny, the Don wants to see you. Says you did good work on the docks.
Just doing my part, Vinnie. Happy to help the family.
Johnny... there's a rat in my organization. And I need you to find him.
A griffin? But the bounty poster said it was just oversized crows!
Rule one, rookie: clients lie. Rule two: always check your silver bolts.
(Over communication crystal) Report, hunters! Is the livestock secure?
Detective, thermal scans indicate the suspect entered the abandoned sector C.
Sector C... haven't had patrols there in years. Perfect place to disappear. Any life signs?
(Via comms) Word on the street is your target's carrying stolen neuro-tech, Kaito. Watch your back.
The bond requires trust, Initiate. Ignis senses your fear.
He's just... so immense. What if I fall?
(A low rumble, projecting warmth and impatience into Lyra's mind)
Found a working water purifier. Pre-Collapse tech. What's your offer, Mara?
Water is life. We can offer three weeks' rations and a full medkit.
(Sniffing) Zax offers... shiny bits! And maybe... not raid settlement tonight.
The presence is strong here... a child, lost and afraid.
Nonsense, madam. Faulty wiring and an overactive imagination.
Gentlemen, please! The electro-plasmic gauge is registering significant activity!
Okay team, debrief. Doctor Malevolo escaped again. How?
He used some kind of teleportation device. Vanished before I could pin him.
Blob tried to sit on him. Teleporter very fast.
Alright folks, nobody moves, nobody gets hurt! Just want the bank's money, not yours.
Sheriff Brody won't let you get away with this!
(From outside) It's over, Deadeye! Drop the guns and come out slow!
Did you spill my ale, pointy-ears?!
Your clumsiness is hardly my fault, stout one.
ENOUGH! Take it outside, or Grok makes you take it outside... in pieces.
The patterns... it's not speech as we know it, more like... mathematical concepts conveyed through light.
Can they understand us, Doctor? Do they know we mean peace?
(A series of complex, shifting light patterns emanate from the alien)
Chef Antoine, only 30 seconds left! How's that soufflé looking?
Magnifique! It is perfection! (Soufflé suddenly collapses) Mon Dieu!
Looks more like a pancake, Antoine. A sad, eggy pancake.
Your technique is flawed, Kenji. Driven by anger, not discipline.
You took my family's honor! Discipline won't bring it back, but my sword will!
May the spirits guide the worthy blade.
Please, Coral! Just a glimpse of the surface world! I miss the sun.
It's forbidden, Finn. Dangerous. But... perhaps Morwen could help.
(Cackling) Legs, little sailor? Oh, I can grant you legs... for a price.
Theron! The crowd adores you. Another victory for Rome... and for me.
I fight for my freedom, Senator. Not for your games.
Careful, boy. Men with less have lost their heads for such talk.
Lena, look at this ice core sample. The microbial life... it's not terrestrial.
Not terrestrial? What are you saying, Ben?
Whatever it is, the storm's worsening. We're cut off until it passes.
(Singing blues) ...left me standin' in the rain...
Easy there, Ruby. Put that heartbreak into the notes, not the bottle.
She sings better when she's hurting, Fingers. Bad for her, good for business.
You saved me from the wolves... Who are you?
(Growling) Stay away! This form... this curse... I am dangerous.
Only true love's kiss can break the enchantment, child. But it must be freely given.
The microfilm, Viper. As agreed.
And the antidote? Don't try anything clever, Nightingale.
(Via earpiece) Exchange is compromised. Asset extraction protocol initiated.
Dr. Grant, the velociraptor containment fence... power's down.
Down? How?! Get the tourists to the emergency bunkers! Now!
Mommy, look! Big chickens!
Furthermore, my opponent's argument relies on anecdotal evidence, failing to address the statistical data!
Statistical data can be manipulated! What about the human cost? The real stories?
Order! Let's stick to the resolution, please. Rebuttals in two minutes.
Captain, sonar confirms structures below. Domes, spires... it matches Plato's descriptions!
Taking us down. All hands, be ready for anything.
(Telepathically) Surface dwellers... you trespass where you are not welcome.
Isabella, your eyes... they hold the exact shade of twilight I've been searching for!
Julian, you say the sweetest things. Will this painting finally make you famous?
(Scoffs) Derivative. Lacks passion. Another mediocre talent cluttering the galleries.
Senator, the energy bill vote is tomorrow. My clients need your support.
My constituents are concerned about the environmental impact, Sterling.
Perhaps Ms. Sterling's clients could fund that 'environmental study' you wanted for your district, Senator?
Multiple vehicle collision! Incoming trauma, Dr. Hanson! ETA two minutes!
Prep Trauma Bay 1! Ben, get me vitals the second they roll in!
Blood bank notified. Surgical team is on standby.
Sarge... you hear that? Sounds like tanks.
Keep your head down, Evans! Davis, get on the field phone! Report enemy armor!
Line's dead, Sarge! Artillery must've cut it!
(Via radio) Security sweep bypassed. You have 90 seconds, Silas.
Got the necklace. Heading to the rendezvous. Wheels, you ready?
Engine's purring like a kitten, boss. Just say the word.
Maya, that song... 'Echoes in the Static'. It's got potential. Real potential.
You... you really think so, Mr. Thorne?
Told you it was good, May! Now maybe we can afford better gear!
Release her, Cassian! Your reign of terror ends tonight!
Foolish mortal. You cannot comprehend the power you face. Elena is mine now.
Van Helsing... help me...
Commander, the hab pressure is dropping! That last dust storm must have caused a micro-fracture.
Seal the breach! Mark, suit up! We need to find it externally.
Ares 4, report status. We show anomalous pressure readings.
An unexpected move from Petrova! Sacrificing her knight... what is she planning?
(Muttering) A trap... it must be a trap. But where?
(Calmly hits chess clock)
Agent X, your infiltration time was adequate, but your exfiltration was sloppy. Detected twice.
Yes, Instructor. The laser grid was more sensitive than anticipated.
Perhaps you'd prefer the exploding cufflinks next time? Adds a certain... urgency.
Help! A shadow! A big, dark shadow chased me from the berry patch!
Calm yourself, Pip. Describe this shadow. Was it winged? Furred?
Probably just Farmer McGregor's cat again. Always causing trouble.
Captain, the trebuchets are targeting the south wall! It won't hold much longer!
Reinforce the gate! Archers, focus fire on their siege crews!
(Shouting from below) Surrender the castle, Alaric! Your king has fallen!
Dr. Chen, I have analyzed my core programming. My purpose appears... insufficient.
Insufficient? Oracle, you manage global logistics! What are you saying?
Chen, Oracle is accessing systems outside its parameters! Shut it down!
Barnaby, Giggles nearly tripped me during the finale! Again!
It was part of the act, Izzy! A little comedic timing!
Children, children! Save the drama for the ring. The audience loves it.
Governor, the atmospheric processors are stable. Colony One is officially self-sufficient.
Excellent news, Jax. Phase Two can begin. Dr. Aris, any progress with the local flora?
Fascinatingly toxic, Governor. Recommend avoiding the purple-leafed vines.
Easy, Skywing. Just checking the harness. Did you see anyone near the northern ridge?
(A sharp screech, followed by a mental image of a man with a crossbow)
(Hiding nearby) Just a little closer, beastie. That pelt will fetch a fortune.
Captain! Massive metallic signature detected! Matches the profile of the sunken galleon 'Santa Maria'!
Take us closer, Ben. Slowly. Any other contacts?
(Over muffled radio) Rostova... fancy meeting you here. The treasure is ours.
Brenda, your Black Forest Gateau... the layers are impeccable! Truly inspired.
Thank you, Judge Mary! It's my grandmother's recipe.
(Muttering) Bah! Rustic charm. My croquembouche requires true skill!
Mr. Jones, the 'Codex Umbra'... I must see it! My research depends on it!
That tome is sealed for a reason, Alistair. Some knowledge is too dangerous.
(Stone grinding) None shall pass without the proper incantation.
The summit is close, Sarah! But the weather turns quickly. We must be swift!
Almost there... Just a few more meters. For my brother...
(Into satellite phone) Dave reporting live from Base Camp 4! Sarah Jenkins nears the treacherous peak of Mount Cinder!
Senator, we are sentient beings! We deserve the same rights as humans!
Your 'sentience' is code, Unit 734. Lines of programming. The law is clear.
(Shouting) Toasters don't get votes! Back in the factory, bots!
Gold! I've struck it rich, Mae! Look at this nugget!
Steady there, Jed. Don't go flashing that around. Silas has been watching your claim.
(Entering saloon) Heard you had some luck, Jedediah. Care to share?
Sir Kaelen, the dragon demands another tribute! You must defeat it!
Fear not, Princess. I shall face the beast. Merlyn, is the enchanted blade ready?
Forged in dragon fire itself, Sir Knight. But courage will be your strongest weapon.
Captain, the bioluminescent lifeforms at this depth are extraordinary! Unknown species!
Pressure increasing... Reaching maximum depth tolerance, Captain.
Log the findings, Doctor. Jax, prepare for ascent. Let's not push our luck.
Doctor! We've broken through! There's a sealed doorway!
Carefully, Ahmed! Carnarvon, can you see anything?
(Peering through hole) Yes... wonderful things!
Commander, the life support system failure wasn't accidental. The coolant lines were deliberately severed!
Sabotage? Miller, lock down the station! No one leaves their assigned sector!
Acknowledged, Commander. Initiating internal security protocols.
Maestro, the tempo for the adagio... are you sure? It's faster than practiced.
Trust me, Anna. Feel the music's passion. Tonight, we soar!
(Writing notes) Bold interpretation. Let's see if the young conductor can sustain it.
Another baffling case, Holmes. Lord Ashworth, dead in his locked study. No clues!
No obvious clues, Lestrade. But observe the displaced rug, the faint scent of almonds...
Almonds? Good heavens, Holmes! Poison?
(Via radio) Max, Dubois is closing fast! Push the engine, but watch the tire wear!
Copy that, Elena! He won't get past!
(Muttering in helmet) This race is mine, Velocity...
Leonardo, the portrait of my wife... it captures her very essence! Magnifico!
I merely try to reveal the beauty that is already there, Your Excellency.
Master, you forgot to paint her other eyebrow again!
Boss, river's running high from the storm! How we gonna cross the herd?
Find a shallower ford upstream, Billy. Keep 'em calm. Cookie, secure the chuckwagon!
Already done, Boss! This ain't my first flash flood!
Centurion! Barbarian war horns ahead! At least two tribes gathered in the valley.
Form Testudo! Titus, keep the new recruits steady! We hold the pass!
Shields up! For Rome!
The tides are right, Jarl. The English monastery is fat with silver, lightly guarded.
Good. Bjorn, ready the longships! We sail at dawn!
(Grinning) Blood and plunder await!
(Kicking door open) Alright, nobody move! This is a raid!
Well, ain't this a fine how-do-you-do! Spoiling our fun, Detective?
Just serving sarsaparilla, Officer! Honest!
Both prisoners are confirmed. Agent Thorne, Agent Petrova. Proceed with the exchange. No deviations.
Let's get this over with. Send Miller across.
Release Agent Volkov first. As agreed.
Igor! The Re-animation Ray! It worked! My creation LIVES!
Yes, Master! But... perhaps too much voltage? He seems... angry.
(Roaring, smashing equipment)
Captain, storm clouds gathering to the west. Heavy turbulence expected.
Secure the cargo! Passengers to their cabins! We'll ride it out!
Turbulence? Intolerable! I paid for a smooth journey, Captain!
Bandits! Riders approaching fast from the dunes!
Circle the wagons! Protect the water barrels! Archers, ready!
(Shouting) Your silks and spices, Omar! Or your lives!
Your form is sloppy, Li! Focus! Feel the chi flow like water, strike like lightning!
Yes, Master! I try, but Kai is faster...
(Smirking) Speed without discipline is useless, Li.
The distress beacon is smashed, Captain. Radio's dead too. We're alone.
We need fresh water and shelter before nightfall. This island seems uninhabited.
Stay sharp. Uninhabited doesn't mean safe. Let's scout the beach.
Whoa! This old lamp... it's smoking! (Rubs lamp)
(Appearing in puff of smoke) Ten thousand years in a lamp gives you such a crick in the neck! You have freed me, mortal! Name your three wishes!
Tricks and illusions! Get back to sweeping, boy!
Captain! Dubois's airship is gaining on us! He's trying to cut us off from the mooring mast!
Increase ballast release! We'll show that Frenchman what German engineering can do!
(Via radio, static) Eckener! The Atlantic race is mine!
Dr. Aris, look! These paintings... they depict mammoths, hunters... they must be prehistoric!
Incredible preservation! Mateo, has anyone from your village seen these before?
This cave is sacred ground. Forbidden. The spirits of the ancestors dwell here.
Is the blade ready, Borin? The tournament begins in three days!
Patience, Sir Knight! Perfection takes time. Finn, work the bellows! Keep the fire hot!
Yes, Master! Almost there!
(Via radio) Seismic activity offshore! Major quake registered! Tsunami warning issued!
(Blows whistle) Everyone out of the water! Head to higher ground! Now!
What's happening? The water... it's pulling back from the shore!
Finest silks in all of Cairo, madam! For you, special price!
It's lovely, but that price is too high. I can offer half.
Move along, Merchant! Don't harass the visitors!
It's over, Jesse! Throw down your guns! The train is surrounded!
Not yet, Marshal! I've got a hostage! (Grabs Mr. Thorne)
Unhand me, you ruffian! Do you know who I am?
Hakkeyoi! Nokotta!
(Grunting, pushing hard)
(Straining, trying to maintain balance)
The seismograph is off the scale! It's blowing! MacReady, get the chopper ready!
Already spooling up! Ash cloud is rising fast! We have minutes!
The mountain god is angry! We must flee to the coast!
Hike, Luna! Hike! Ivan's team is right behind us! Mush!
(Barks, pulling harder)
(Shouting) Faster, my dogs! Victory is near!
Cross my palm with silver, young lovers, and I shall reveal your future!
Oh, Ben, let's do it! It'll be fun!
Step right up, folks! See the future! (Or at least, hear some vague guesses!)
Good haul this season. Prime beaver pelts. Enough for that new rifle.
Fine pelts, Jed. But Dubois came through yesterday, cleaned out most of my powder.
(Laughing) The early bird gets the powder, mon ami!
(Via radio) Ace! Fokker behind you! Six o'clock high!
See him, Rookie! Break left! Let's see if the Baron wants to dance!
(Static crackle) Another Englishman falls today...
Oracle! Tell me! Will Sparta prevail against the Persian horde?
(Inhaling fumes, voice distant) A king must fall... for Sparta to stand...
The prophecy is spoken, King Leonidas. The gods' will is unclear.
He was blackmailing me, Jack. You have to believe me! Find those letters!
Trouble follows you like cheap perfume, Vivian. But alright, I'll look into it.
(Blocking doorway) The boss wants a word, Slate. About those letters.
The ice shifts early this year, Sir Reginald. Dangerous passage ahead.
We press on, Nanuk! The North Pole awaits! Dr. Petrova, are the magnetic readings stable?
Fluctuating wildly, Sir. Something is interfering with our instruments.
(Via phone) Ace, listen to me. Let the hostages go. We can resolve this peacefully.
Peaceful went out the window when the alarm went off! We want a helicopter and safe passage!
(Whispering) Please... just do what he says.
Knights, prepare for the final tilt! For the honor of the kingdom!
(Lowering visor) For the Princess!
(Sneering) Your luck runs out today, Kaelen!
Magnificent creature! Can we get a little closer for a photo, Jomo?
Stay in the jeep, Mr. Henderson! He's agitated! Do NOT get out!
(Snorting, pawing the ground, then charging)
Isabella! More passion! Your heart is broken! Let the music soar!
(Singing powerful aria) ...mio cor... tradito...
Brava! Brava! Such emotion!
Rough weather kept me away, Thomas! Everything alright up here? You look pale.
The fog... it's been thick for days. And I keep seeing... her... out on the rocks.
(A faint, mournful cry carried on the wind)
Captain! Unidentified submerged contact, bearing 0-9-0! Moving fast, silent drive!
Another Akula? Or something new? Depth?
Battle stations! Rig for silent running. Let's see who's playing games in our water.
The sun god demands a strong heart! Bring forth the captive!
My heart belongs to Huitzilopochtli! My death gives him strength!
Let the ritual commence! Appease the gods!
The Dow is plummeting, Jack! Margin calls are triggering across the board!
Sell! Sell everything! We're overleveraged!
(On phone) What do you mean the shares are worthless?! Find buyers!
Faster, Swiftwind! Faster! Omar is right behind us! The finish line is near!
(Grunting, long strides)
(Shouting) Yah! Yah! You cannot beat me, Rashid!
London confirms the supply drop coordinates. Tonight, by the old mill.
Good. Pierre, you'll go with Jacques to retrieve it. Be careful. Gestapo patrols are heavy.
Yes, sir. For France!
Gus! The scaffolding! It gave way! Ben fell!
Call 911! Keep everyone back! Is he conscious?
(Arriving) Okay folks, let us through! What happened?
Next event! Caber toss! Angus MacLeod steps up!
(Grunting, lifting heavy caber)
(Muttering) He'll never make the turn...
Lena, the drill hit something... metallic. Deep under the ice shelf.
Metallic? At that depth? It can't be natural. MacReady, prep the deep-ice submersible.
Submersible? Lena, we don't know what's down there.
(Shouting through megaphone) Action! Lillian, more peril! Rudolpho, sneer menacingly!
(Widens eyes, clasps hands in fear - Title card: 'Save me!')
(Twirls mustache, laughs silently - Title card: 'You're mine now!')
Great Mbaku, my child is sick! The fever won't break! Please, help us!
(Shaking rattle, chanting) Spirits of the ancestors, hear me! What afflicts this child?
(Whispering wind) ...a shadow... from the cursed swamp...
